name: Ezy
description: A small 2D platformer in pixel style. You play as a dinosaur "Ezy", you need to get to the castle, but it will not be easy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Memory: 1 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 100 MB available space
